DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal project well enable patient uterine fibroid ( UF ) make informed decision treatment option leverage high possible evidence healthcare quality . The foundation project multi-site , prospective registry diverse group woman undergo either medical surgical treatment UF . Specifically , investigator interest : compare management option symptom relief ; compare management option preserve reproductive function ; compare effectiveness among different subpopulation , include consideration patient need preference treatment option .
DOC.detailed_description: COMPARE UF enroll approximately 10,000 subject across 9 clinical enrolling center US . We anticipate recruitment last approximately 24 month . Sites consent interested patient complete patient contact information form use contact patient telephone interview . Following informed consent , site collect clinical information several patient-reported outcome scale , include Uterine Fibroid Symptom Quality Life Questionnaire ( UFS-QOL ) , Menopausal Rating Scale , EQ-5D , standardized measure general health outcome . In year 01 study , among patient receive procedure treat UF , 1000 ask provide two blood sample : first time enrollment ( procedure ) second 12 month procedure . Samples evaluate ovarian reserve via blood assay measurement anti-mullerian hormone . Additionally , patient procedure treat UF , routine clinic follow-up visit , sometime 6 - 12 week post procedure . Additional clinical data collect time . For patient treat medically , study-related clinic visit . Follow-up occur exclusively telephone . All consent patient complete telephone interview approximately 12 , 24 , 36 month follow initial procedure . It anticipate patient enrol first study year complete maximum three year follow-up . However , additional fund become available , investigator plan extend follow-up enrolled patient five year .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis UF image pathology report within 2 year enrollment initiation . Menstrual period within 12 month Postmenopausal Men 55 year old old
